name: Required Message validation test for multiple fields
description: The test sets a value with the wrong data type in several fields for different widgets. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered
descriptionHtml: The test sets a value with the wrong data type in several fields for different widgets. After approval, it checks the text under the field, which informs about the correctness of the type of data entered
